Blacknightmare::

Blacknightmare opened her comm link and answered "Put him in the cr 
and press follow codes (Send him the codes) with them  you can hold 
him there in stasis while your master come and decide his fate -by 
the way, just your commander or mine can let him go out... Can you 
give us a hand? we have a pest here" and told to Silverscout "Ok 
pest... I tried to be nice with you but if you don't like be nice... 
Then I have to be rude..."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Demise/EndBringer::
> 
> Demise and EndBringer arrive back at the Blackfortress, Demise 
> instantly going to the CR chambers. EndBringer opens a comm to 
anyone 
> in the base, having no idea who was in charge without any of the 
> leaders here.
> 
> "Hey, I have a prisoner," he says while still shocking and 
attempting 
> to crush Double Punch in his tentacles, "I don't know if he's 
alive, 
> but where do I put him?"
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> > ::KitKat2::
> > 
> > "Yeah, the intruder is heading for us, slowly. Stand ready to 
> attack."
> > KitKat2 aimed her weapons where the bot would appear.
